itxMIB.name: itxMIB
itxMIB.contactinfo: 904 Wind River Lane Suite 101 Gaithersburg, MD 20878 (301)-417-0017

itxDspStatusTable.name: itxDspStatusTable
itxDspStatusTable.description: The itxDspStatusTable provides a means to find the status of a specific DSP. There are 64 (8x8) entries for each Transcoder plug-in

itxDspStatusEntry.name: itxDspStatusEntry
itxDspStatusEntry.description: This sequence contains information to identify the specific DSP on a specific Transcoder plug-in. In addition, it also contains the Operational Status for the specified DSP

itxDspStatusPhysIndex.name: itxDspStatusPhysIndex
itxDspStatusPhysIndex.description: The entPhysicalIndex that uniqely identifies the DSP complex on the Transcoder plug-in.

itxDspStatusRow.name: itxDspStatusRow
itxDspStatusRow.description: The row in the DSP complex for the DSP entry. When used together with itxDspStatusColumn, the exact DSP in the DSP complex can be found

itxDspStatusColumn.name: itxDspStatusColumn
itxDspStatusColumn.description: The column in the DSP complex for the DSP entry. When used together with itxDspStatusRow, the exact DSP in the DSP complex can be found

itxDspStatusOperStatus.name: itxDspStatusOperStatus
itxDspStatusOperStatus.description: The Operational status of the specified DSP. up(1) - The DSP is operational down(2) - The DSP is not operational unknown(3) - The Operational Status of the DSP is not known

itxMediaControllerPrimaryIpAddress.name: itxMediaControllerPrimaryIpAddress
itxMediaControllerPrimaryIpAddress.description: The IP Address for the Primary Media Controller

itxMediaControllerPrimaryPort.name: itxMediaControllerPrimaryPort
itxMediaControllerPrimaryPort.description: The port for the Primary Media Controller

itxMediaControllerSecondaryIpAddress.name: itxMediaControllerSecondaryIpAddress
itxMediaControllerSecondaryIpAddress.description: The IP Address for the Secondary Media Controller

itxMediaControllerSecondaryPort.name: itxMediaControllerSecondaryPort
itxMediaControllerSecondaryPort.description: The port for the Secondary Media Controller

itxMediaControllerActiveController.name: itxMediaControllerActiveController
itxMediaControllerActiveController.description: The configured active Media Controller the Call Control is using to handle call management. Writing a value that is different from its current value will force Call Control to switch to using the specified Media Controller. primary(1) - The Primary Media Contrller is the active controller secondary (2) - The Secondary Media Contrller is the active controller

itxIsdnBackHaulMediaControllerIpAddress.name: itxIsdnBackHaulMediaControllerIpAddress
itxIsdnBackHaulMediaControllerIpAddress.description: The IP Address for the ISDN BackHaul Media Controller

itxIsdnBackHaulMediaControllerPort.name: itxIsdnBackHaulMediaControllerPort
itxIsdnBackHaulMediaControllerPort.description: The port for the ISDN BackHaul Media Controller

itxMediaSubnet.name: itxMediaSubnet
itxMediaSubnet.description: The subnet from which media IP address are selected from

itxMediaSubnetMask.name: itxMediaSubnetMask
itxMediaSubnetMask.description: The subnet mask from which media IP address are selected from

itxNetworkManagementAddress.name: itxNetworkManagementAddress
itxNetworkManagementAddress.description: The IP Address for the NMS Agent

itxNetworkManagementSubnetMask.name: itxNetworkManagementSubnetMask
itxNetworkManagementSubnetMask.description: The Subnet Mask for the NMS Agent

itxEthernetTable.name: itxEthernetTable
itxEthernetTable.description: The ITX default Gateway for ethernet interfaces.

itxEthernetEntry.name: itxEthernetEntry
itxEthernetEntry.description: The Default Gateway entry is indexed by ifIndex. The entry contains the Ip address for the default gateway for the specified Ethernet interface. There are no entries in the table for non-ethernet interfaces and exactly one for each ethernet interface

itxDefaultGateway.name: itxDefaultGateway
itxDefaultGateway.description: The IP Address of the default gateway

itxIpAddress.name: itxIpAddress
itxIpAddress.description: The IP Address of the interface

itxSubnetMask.name: itxSubnetMask
itxSubnetMask.description: The Subnetmask of the interface. One of these objects exists for each of the ethernet interface in the chassis

itxSnmpManagementEntityIpAddress.name: itxSnmpManagementEntityIpAddress
itxSnmpManagementEntityIpAddress.description: The Ip Address for SNMP Management Entity for the Agent (ITX) to send the traps to. Used together with the itxSnmpManagementEntityPort to fully specify the Entity

itxSnmpManagementEntityPort.name: itxSnmpManagementEntityPort
itxSnmpManagementEntityPort.description: The Port for SNMP Management Entity for the Agent (ITX) to send the traps to. Used together with the itxSnmpManagementEntityIpAddress to fully specify the Entity

itxCallControlProtocol.name: itxCallControlProtocol
itxCallControlProtocol.description: The IPDC protocol version number version0dot15(1) - IPDC Version 0.15, sgcpVersion0(2) - SGCP Version 0, mgcpVersion0.1(3) - MGCP Version 0.1

itxCompandingLaw.name: itxCompandingLaw
itxCompandingLaw.description: The value selects either aLaw or muLaw as the companding law

itxDnsIpAddress.name: itxDnsIpAddress
itxDnsIpAddress.description: The Ip Address for the Domain Name server the system should use to map hostnames to Ip Addresses

itxHostname.name: itxHostname
itxHostname.description: The Fully Qualified Hostname for the system (includes both the hostname and the domain name. i.e.: etx5000.salix.com would be a valid value

itxEthernetLoadSharing.name: itxEthernetLoadSharing
itxEthernetLoadSharing.description: This object controls Ethernet Load Sharing across multiple Ethernet Interfaces. The default value is enabled. By setting the value to disabled, calls will no longer be load shared across ethernet interfaces

itxNFSIpAddress.name: itxNFSIpAddress
itxNFSIpAddress.description: This object controls the Ip Address that the ETX will mount its file system from. Any changes to this object while there is a currently mounted file system will not be effective until the currently mounted file system is unmounted

itxNFSPath.name: itxNFSPath
itxNFSPath.description: This object controls the Path that the ETX will mount its file system from. Any changes to this object while there is a currently mounted file system will not be effective until the currently mounted file system is unmounted

itxNFSUserId.name: itxNFSUserId
itxNFSUserId.description: This object controls the User Id (uid) that the ETX will use when communicating with the NFS server. Any changes to this object while there is a currently mounted file system will not be effective until the currently mounted file system is unmounted

itxNFSGroupId.name: itxNFSGroupId
itxNFSGroupId.description: This object controls the Group Id (gid) that the ETX will use when communicating with the NFS server. Any changes to this object while there is a currently mounted file system will not be effective until the currently mounted file system is unmounted

itxNFSStatus.name: itxNFSStatus
itxNFSStatus.description: This object shows the current status of the nfs connection. In addition, the nfs volume can be mounted and unmounted by writing the approriate value to this object

itxCompliance.name: itxCompliance
itxCompliance.description: The basic implementation requirements for the ITX MIB.
